text: “マグノリアシティ”は様々な物語が始まる場所だ。
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: #FFF0A3;left: 7.98%;top: 2.07%;width: 39.66%;height: 1.13%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
謳い文句は
“ヒーローが行くべき都市”
この地で一番
賑やかな都市
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: #FFF0A3;left: 8.76%;top: 4.45%;width: 22.92%;height: 3.02%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
そう、ここでは旅行者に
必要な物が何でも手に入るんだ!
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: #FFF0A3;left: 40.34%;top: 20.93%;width: 27.87%;height: 1.13%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

font-size: 20px;color: black;background-color: #FFF0A3;left: 32.92%;top: 30.93%;width: 15.73%;height: 1.43%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
英雄志望だらけの街は
犯罪が少ないと思うかもしれない
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: #FFF0A3;left: 54.44%;top: 30.77%;width: 29.55%;height: 1.71%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: #FFF0A3;left: 13.09%;top: 34.16%;width: 14.27%;height: 1.07%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
大半は無意味なクエストや
交易に夢中な見かけ倒し。
だから僕が壁の周りの怪しい影を見張ってる
